full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO SKU LNGA'I BZHES GTOR 'BUL BA'I 'DOD NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI STER MNGA' BA'I CHO GA TU RGYUD BLA MA LA BRTEN PA, KHYAD PAR GANGS CAN MGON PO'I GNYIS PA MCHOG TU RJES ZHABS BRTAN PA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS BCUR DAR BZHIN RGYAS PA 'GRO BA DGE PHEL ZHING TSE RING RGYAS PA PHYIR DU SNYUNG SKU SKYE AER TE NI TA YANG CHE GU 'SHRI CHOS KYI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO SUG BRIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DI KYANG NAS SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
